page.title: 07FARMING IN NTH. KILWORTH
page.content: {SANDERCOCK'S FARM Sandercock's farm is a mixed farm with beef & dairy,sheep and arable.It has just over 300 acres for 49 cows,140 beef cattle ,190 sheep & 80 acres of arable. The house is victorian.In the summer they use 16% protein cow cake and in the winter they use silage,hay and straw.They have employed Nicola Munden this year but have not employed any workers before. {HERRING'S FARM} This is now part of a 400 acre arable farm. It was previously a mixed farm, with a dairy herd of 80.The farm buildings, in the centre of the village,were Manor Farm, belonging to the Belgrave family, Lords of the manor since 1511.
